---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report maintenance tasks, refactoring, or housekeeping needs
title: 'Maintenance: '
labels: maintenance
assignees: ''
---

## Maintenance Type
- [ ] Code Refactoring
- [ ] Dependency Updates
- [ ] Performance Optimization
- [ ] Technical Debt
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Testing
- [ ] Other: ___________

## Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

## Current State
Describe the current state of the code/documentation/system that needs maintenance.

## Desired State
Describe what the end result should look like after the maintenance is complete.

## Areas Affected
List the files, modules, or areas of the codebase that will be affected.

## Priority Justification
Explain why this maintenance task should be prioritized.

## Estimated Effort
- [ ] Small (< 2 hours)
- [ ] Medium (2-8 hours)
- [ ] Large (> 8 hours)

## Dependencies
List any dependencies or blockers for this maintenance task.

## Additional Notes
Add any other context or information about the maintenance task here.
